post:
Heyo! I wanted to incorporate the free domain promotion I recently posted into something for Black Friday too, so here I am offering a bundle package which is 3 cPanel Shared Hosting accounts in all 3 of our locations with a free .COM domain registration! As well as some other plan price cuts!

Manchester, UK 149.255.59.13 | Luxembourg, EU 107.189.3.7 | Charlotte, US 107.161.114.34

The first ten bundle orders can also register a .com domain for free. Your .com will be free for one year. After one year, you can renew your domain at £6.99/year, transfer it to your preferred registrar, or let it expire with no commitment. We offer free WHOIS protection and DNS management. (Please open a support ticket after completing your order to request your .com domain)
